artist: Engraver: David Lockley; Publisher: Robert Hulton
description: trade card/ advertisement for publisher's business interests; center oval portrait of Abraham Bloemart surrounded by particulars of the type of work done by publisher and location
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

in plate in black: [Paintings Cleaned and/Carefully Lined & Mended  Prints and Indian Pictures/Cleaned Very well/ The following Particulars/ made and Sold Very Cheap/ by Robert Hulton at yc/ Corner of Pallmall facing/ the Haymarket St. James/LONDON/ABRAHAM BLOEMAERT/ Fine Gold/ Frames for/ Paintings/ Made]; below image in black:[D\'d. Lockley Sc.]; below image on sheet in pencil:[1-732]
title: Portrait of Abraham Bloemart
